actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to bar civil service annuity payments for periods with respect to which an annuitant is entitled to receive salary as a justice or judge of the United States.

summary.text: Suspends payment of civil service retirement annuities to any former Federal employee or Member of Congress who is appointed to serve as a justice or judge of the United States during the period for which such individual is entitled to receive compensation for service as such a justice or a judge. Permits such individuals to be paid the amount by which their retirement annuity lump-sum credit exceeds the total annuity previously paid. Extends provisions allowing an irrevocable election of a reduced annuity by individuals who marry after retirement to specified annuitants who married after retirement but before January 8, 1971.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to bar civil service annuity payments for periods with respect to which an annuitant is entitled to receive salary as a justice or judge of the United States.
